name: M'Lady and the Tramp (Adult)
description:
Originally created for the Ludum Dare 28 competition. Original entry can be found HERE.

A Windows download is also available HERE.

----------------------------

THIS GAME IS AN ADULT GAME. DO NOT PLAY IF YOU'RE A KID OR EASILY OFFENDED/GROSSED OUT. SERIOUSLY. WE WARNED YOU. 

You only get one virginity: Play a series of short mini-games to help a guy get laid. This game optionally uses a microphone, but we recommend it for the full experience.

Art by Lianne Booton of Team Sadbrains (@Liannethy)
Programming by George 'Pixelbear' Baron (@Pixelbeargames)
Voices by Devi Ever (@Deviever) and Tess Young (@TheChicMonster)
Music by Lame Drivers
